about_the_game:
"Heaven's Rising" is an open-world action RPG. Its actions unfold at the time of the decline of the Christian faith when she began to be considered noble persons only as a way of governing the people. You play as one of the angels of the "Aspida" group - a special unit of the Heavenly Host, which is engaged in protecting the universe from the confusion of the Expanses. You and your brothers and sisters were sent to the human world to find out the reasons for the massive appearance of demons and put an end to it. In the course of your investigation, you will encounter a wide variety of people, from a simple artisan to a noble young aristocrat, where any of your actions will have consequences. Explore a world full of dangerous ruins, deep forests, and places are forgotten by the Father.

KEY FEATURES

PLAY AS AN EXPERIENCED DEMON FIGHTER
You completed the Great War of the Expanses, where you fought against demons and titans. During the elimination of the consequences of this war, you showed yourself as an incredibly talented demon hunter, which is why you became one of the first members of the Aspid group. For thousands of years, your task has been to protect the universe from the penetration of beings from other Spaces.

  • Send demons and sinners where they belong. Do not spare your enemies, for this can entail consequences.
  • Help people, because the stories of the old hunter by the fireplace are not always pure fiction.
  • Do human work. The world lives its own life and people are ready to pay for the solution of their problems to anyone who can help them. The money earned, in turn, will help you quickly get hold of better equipment.

EXPLORE THE OPEN WORLD
The world around does not stand still but lives its own life.

  • Often, turning off the road, you can find something curious that can serve as the beginning of a whole story.
  • For thousands of years of life, you have learned a lesson - there is no pure good or evil. Make decisions that you yourself feel are right and accept their consequences.
  • The Universe is a much more subtle matter than a person can imagine. It is lucky that you are not, because angels are able to fully feel any changes in the world around them, which can lead you to new places that are invisible at first sight.

CHOOSE YOUR WAY
Perhaps during your adventure, you will change your outlook on the world and want to change your life. Become a hero of Heaven, solving the riddle of the appearance of demons, go to the side of Hell and help former enemies, or leave everything and live your own life away from this endless war. What to do is up to you.

  • Develop your character according to your preferences - use exclusively the capabilities of Heaven or Hell, or correctly combine both elements.
  • Play the selected type. You yourself choose who to be, and not by discovering new abilities and moving sliders, but by deed. All your actions will affect the state of mind, which will directly affect the possible development of the character and the attitude of brothers and sisters towards him.
  • Get to know the world of people better. Over the centuries of work in the "Aspida" group, you thought that you knew human nature, but the new mission requires you to stay in the world of people much longer, which will allow you to open them from a new side.

short_description: Several thousand years after the Great War of the Expanses, demons again began to infiltrate the human world en masse. You - a member of the group of angels "Aspida", were sent by Michael to understand the reasons for the appearance of new faults and put an end to it.
